snippet: Lois Lerner, called to testify about how the agency handled applications for tax-exempt status from conservative political groups, had refused to answer questions.
abstract: House Oversight and Government Reform Committee votes to hold former Internal Revenue Service official Lois Lerner in contempt for refusing to answer its questions about her role in holding up applications for tax exemption from conservative political groups before 2012 election.
lead_paragraph: Lois Lerner, called to testify about how the agency handled applications for tax-exempt status from conservative political groups, had refused to answer questions.

headline.main: Oversight Committee Censures Ex-I.R.S. Official for Refusal to Take Questions
headline.print_headline: Oversight Committee Censures Ex-I.R.S. Official for Refusal to Take Questions

keywords.value: House Committee on Ways and Means
keywords.name: organizations
